data.message: I was blocked for a week for sending friend requests. I almost got in trouble since then fro trying to accept a friend request that was sugested by five mutual friend. I do not wish to complain about this person I just want to accept there friend request and If it is in appropriate I will block and make a complaint then. Since then I have recieved another request that I have accepten and you ask if we know them yes or kno. Is that you can block then and blame me for neglecting or rejecting them
